title: inability to ls a R/O dataset probably due to GitPython locking
body:
```
(venv-tests)debanjum@smaug:/mnt/datasets/datalad/crawl/openfmri/ds000001$ datalad ls -l 1 .
2016-06-10 16:52:31,009 [DEBUG  ] Using existing Git repository at /mnt/datasets/datalad/crawl/openfmri/ds000001 (gitrepo.py:391)
2016-06-10 16:52:31,162 [Level 5] Removing temp file: /tmp/tmpvCHL0e (utils.py:260)
.  [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/mnt/datasets/datalad/crawl/openfmri/ds000001/.git/config.lock' [util.py:_obtain_lock_or_raise:545]
2016-06-10 16:52:31,165 [DEBUG  ] Closing 1 SSH connections... (sshconnector.py:179)
2016-06-10 16:52:31,165 [DEBUG  ] Running: ['ssh', '-O', 'stop', '-S', u'/home/debanjum/.config/datalad/datasets.datalad.org', u'datasets.datalad.org'] (cmd.py:352)
 (cmd.py:352):52:31,214 [DEBUG  ] stderr| Control socket connect(/home/debanjum/.config/datalad/datasets.datalad.org): No such file or directory
2016-06-10 16:52:31,215 [DEBUG  ] Failed to run ['ssh', '-O', 'stop', '-S', u'/home/debanjum/.config/datalad/datasets.datalad.org', u'datasets.datalad.org'] under None. Exit code=255. out= err=Control socket connect(/home/debanjum/.config/datalad/datasets.datalad.org): No such file or directory
|  (cmd.py:296)
(venv-tests)debanjum@smaug:/mnt/datasets/datalad/crawl/openfmri/ds000001$ datalad --version
datalad 0.2.dev302
```
